Magister Kaiena: ...Should I kill him...? Ah, nothing, just talking to myself. What brings you here? I'm telling you, Grand Magister Fairen is suffering from headaches lately so please don't annoy him. And I swear to Shilen, I too, do not wish to bothered by worthless things.
